input.sentences: the local student art fair showed the talent the town 's high school student could produce .
here is a drawing by a 17 year old of his home that earned him local recognition .
here a 16 year old youngster 's submission of a snow covered lake she visited for her christmas vacation .
this drawing is of an old farm house on the rural side of town done by a freshman at the school .
this drawing | by a senior | won first place at the art fair . the student got a scholarship to a national art institute .
output.sentences: It's beauty was clouded by the seclusion that came with it but to her, it was home.
Many people saw the pictures of the streams and thought it looked like a vacation.
But to her, the rural landscape only came with dilapidated architecture and a lack of excitement.
It came time to leave in search of a more invigorating lifestyle.
